parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description:
The sender address. If you leave this parameter empty, emails from all sender addresses are queried.

> You can leave **AccountName**, **TagName**, and **ToAddress** empty. You can specify a value for only one of these parameters at a time.

parameters.name: ConfigSetId
parameters.description: The ID of the configuration set.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time. The time range between the start time and the end time cannot exceed 30 days. The format is yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm.

parameters.name: IpPoolId
parameters.description: The ID of the independent IP address pool.

parameters.name: Length
parameters.description: The number of results to return. The value can range from 1 to 100.

parameters.name: NextStart
parameters.description: The offset for this request, used for paging. If more results are available, set the \`NextStart\` parameter in your next request to this return value.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time. The time range between the start time and the end time cannot exceed 30 days. The format is yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The delivery status. If you leave this parameter empty, emails in all delivery statuses are queried. Valid values:

- 0: delivered successfully

- 2: invalid address

- 3: spam

- 4: failed

parameters.name: TagName
parameters.description:
The email tag. If you leave this parameter empty, emails with all tags are queried.
When you send an email using SMTP, specify the \`TagName\` and its value for the \`X-AliDM-Trace\` field. For more information, see the examples for email tracking.

parameters.name: ToAddress
parameters.description: The recipient address. If you leave this parameter empty, emails sent to all recipient addresses are queried.
